column4: hi, I want to buy a cheap video card into my girlfriend's computer (600 MHz Celeron, 256MB RAM), I have these options (equally cheap): nvidia vanta 16MB AGP, savage4 32MB AGP, matrox g400 16MB AGP, ati rage128 8MB AGP, which one should I buy?
none of those, get a geforce 2 mx, thats like 10bucks
thats why i told you my advice
Sjimmie: oh, thanks, I will look for a geforce2 then!
